message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $9,500.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?  This product truly delivers exceptional value.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can do better than that. How about $9,875? I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, I need to be closer to $10,000 to make this work. Would you consider $10,000?  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go up to $10,000. I'm still thinking $9,875 is a fair price. Can you consider that?
